programlisting:
def delete_receipt_rule_set(self, rule_set_name): """ Deletes a rule set. When a rule set is deleted, all of the rules it contains are also deleted.
:param rule_set_name: The name of the rule set to delete. """ try: self.ses_client.delete_receipt_rule_set(RuleSetName=rule_set_name) logger.info("Deleted rule set %s.", rule_set_name) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't delete rule set %s.", rule_set_name) raise
